description: Musthafa Lebbe Rahuma Beevi Vs. Thanapalasuntharam, Divisional Secretary, Valachennai and eight others before Hon. K.M.G.H. Kulatunga, J.
parties: Musthafa Lebbe Rahuma Beevi Vs. Thanapalasuntharam, Divisional Secretary, Valachennai and eight others
keywords: Eviction Notice • Quit Notice • Divisional Secretary’s jurisdiction • rights of an LDO permit holder • laches • requirement of valid permit • Magistrate’s Court proceedings
legistation: Article 140 of the Constitution of Sri Lanka – writ jurisdiction. • State Lands (Recovery of Possession) Act, No. 9 of 1979 - Section 3(1): Eviction notice (quit notice). - Section 5: Institution of proceedings in Magistrate’s Court. - Section 9: Limited objections available to occupiers (valid permit/written authority). • Land Development Ordinance (LDO) – basis for alleged permit
